body: If both `clear` and `fetch_step_id` are used the semantics are unclear, but I would have thought it made more sense to retrieve any previously collected data before clearing?
body_html: If both clear and fetch_step_id are used the semantics are unclear, but I would have thought it made more sense to retrieve any previously collected data before clearing?
body_text: If both clear and fetch_step_id are used the semantics are unclear, but I would have thought it made more sense to retrieve any previously collected data before clearing?
